recipe_name: King prawn and shiitake mushroom skewers with spicy spinach salad
author: Gino D'Acampo
method: For the king prawn and shiitake mushroom skewers, thread the shiitake mushrooms and king prawns alternately onto two skewers and drizzle with olive oil. Heat a griddle pan until hot and griddle the skewers for 3-4 minutes on each side. Add the honey and lemon juice, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and griddle for a further 1-2 minutes on each side, or until the mushrooms are tender and the prawns are completely cooked through. For the spicy spinach salad, place the spinach into a bowl with the olive oil, chilli flakes and the juice of half the lemon and stir well. To serve, place the spicy spinach salad onto a serving plate, top with the skewers and garnish with the remaining lemon half, cut into wedges.
ingredients: 4 shiitake mushrooms,  5 raw king prawns,  1 tbsp olive oil,  1 tbsp honey,  ½ lemon, juice only,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  100g/3½oz spinach,  2 tbsp olive oil,  1 tsp chilli flakes,  1 lemon
